scheme_name: One-Time Grant Money To Soldiers Conferred With Vishisht Seva Medal Award
brief_description: "One-Time Grant Money To Soldiers Conferred With Vishisht Seva Medal Award" is a social security scheme that provides financial assistance to serving soldiers, former soldiers of the state who have been conferred with "Vishisht Seva Medal Award".
detailed_description: "One-Time Grant Money To Soldiers Conferred With Vishisht Seva Medal Award" is a social security scheme by the State Sainik Board, Government of Uttarakhand. Under this scheme, a one-time grant is admissible to serving soldiers, former soldiers of the state who have been conferred with the "Vishisht Seva Medal Award".
benefits: A maximum of ₹2,00,000/- and a minimum of ₹75,000/- is given.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant should be a serving soldier or a former soldier. The soldier should be conferred with the "Vishisht Seva Medal Award".

steps: Registration Process: Step 1: Visit Apuni Sarkar and click on the "Sign Up Here" button. Step 2: Fill the required details i.e. Email ID, Gender, Name, Mobile Number, Date Of Birth, District, Tehsil, Address of Applicant, Notifications Language Preference. Step 3: Click on "Submit".  Post-Registration Process: Step 1: Visit Apuni Sarkar portal. Step 2: In "Citizen Login" window enter your phone number/mail id, correct password and captcha code. Step 3: Click on "Sign In" button. Step 4: From the left side menu button click on "DBT Services" then choose "Soldier Welfare Department".
Step 5: Now click on the scheme "One time Cash Grant for Special Service (Param Vishisht Seva Medal, Ati Vishisht Seva Medal, Vishisht Seva Medal, Sena Medal (Distinguished)".

Step 6: Enter the mobile number and verify with the OTP. Step 7: Click on the checkbox for WhatsApp Verification (for receiving updates regarding your application via WhatsApp). Step 8: Now upload all the mandatory documents and click on "Submit".
Step 8: The application can be tracked from the "Profile" section.

Step 1: Prescribed format can be collected from the nearest District Sainik Welfare Office. Step 2: Fill the form properly and attach all the documents (attested,if required). Step 3: Submit the form at the District Sainik Welfare Office.

documents_required: Mandatory Documents: Photocopy of the applicant's Aadhaar card. PAN card. Bank Passbook and Cancelled Cheque. Identity card of the dependent (if the applicant is a dependent). Domicile certificate of Uttarakhand. Photocopy of the gazette notification regarding the award of Vishisht Seva Medal. Declaration in an affidavit of ₹ 10/- to the effect that the applicant has not received grant payable on medal from any other state in the past and will not do so in future. Photocopy of the discharge book (if the applicant is a veteran). Identity card of Ex-Serviceman/Serviceman's widow/Serving Certificate for serving soldiers.  Optional Documents: NOC for cash grant/annuity if the applicant is residing in other district/state. Proof of permanent residence in case applicant is residing in other district/state(Electricity bill/Water Bill/Telephone Bill/Ration Card/Registry of Land or House). Any other documents as required.
